verses.verse: בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> In those days הָהֵ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> those חָלָ֥ה <S%H2470><s%> sick חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H2396><s%> was Hezekiah לָמ֑וּת <S%H4191><s%> unto death וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> came אֵ֠לָיו <S%H413><s%> and יְשַׁעְיָ֨הוּ <S%H3470><s%> Isaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אָמ֜וֹץ <S%H531><s%> of Amoz הַנָּבִ֗יא <S%H5030><s%> And the prophet וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> to him and said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> to him כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> unto him Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> in order לְבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <S%H1004><s%> Set thine house כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for מֵ֥ת <S%H4191><s%> for thou shalt die אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and not תִֽחְיֶֽה׃ <S%H2421><s%> and not live

וַיַּסֵּ֥ב <S%H5437><s%> Then he turned אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> his face אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַקִּ֑יר <S%H7023><s%> to the wall וַיִּ֨תְפַּלֵּ֔ל <S%H6419><s%> and prayed אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

אָנָּ֣ה <S%H577><s%> I beseech יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> thee O LORD זְכָר־ <S%H2142><s%> remember נָ֞א <S%H4994><s%> now אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> how הִתְהַלַּ֣כְתִּי <S%H1980><s%> now how I have walked לְפָנֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before בֶּֽאֱמֶת֙ <S%H571><s%> thee in truth וּבְלֵבָ֣ב <S%H3824><s%> heart שָׁלֵ֔ם <S%H8003><s%> and with a perfect וְהַטּ֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [that which is] good בְּעֵינֶ֖יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight עָשִׂ֑יתִי <S%H6213><s%> and have done וַיֵּ֥בְךְּ <S%H1058><s%> wept חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H2396><s%> And Hezekiah בְּכִ֥י <S%H1058><s%> wept גָדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> sore ס

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> came יְשַׁעְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3470><s%> And it came to pass afore Isaiah לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Before יָצָ֔א <S%H3318><s%> was gone out [הָעִיר כ] (חָצֵ֖ר <S%H5892><s%> Ai ק) הַתִּֽיכֹנָ֑ה <S%H8484><s%> into the middle וּדְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> that the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> came אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> to him לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came to him saying

שׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> Turn again וְאָמַרְתָּ֞ <S%H559><s%> and tell אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah נְגִיד־ <S%H5057><s%> the captain עַמִּ֗י <S%H5971><s%> of my people כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵי֙ <S%H430><s%> the God דָּוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> of David אָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> thy father שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H8085><s%> I have heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּפִלָּתֶ֔ךָ <S%H8605><s%> thy prayer רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> I have seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּמְעָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1832><s%> thy tears הִנְנִי֙ <S%H2005><s%> behold רֹ֣פֶא <S%H7495><s%> behold I will heal לָ֔ךְ בַּיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> thee on the third תַּעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> thou shalt go up בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְהֹסַפְתִּ֣י <S%H3254><s%> And I will add עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto יָמֶ֗יךָ <S%H3117><s%> unto thy days חֲמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> fif עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years וּמִכַּ֤ף <S%H3709><s%> out of the hand מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> of the king אַשּׁוּר֙ <S%H804><s%> of Assyria אַצִּ֣ילְךָ֔ <S%H5337><s%> and I will deliver וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> thee and this city הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> and I וְגַנּוֹתִי֙ <S%H1598><s%> and I will defend עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> this city הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> my own לְמַֽעֲנִ֔י <S%H4616><s%> sake וּלְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> sake דָּוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> David's עַבְדִּֽי׃ <S%H5650><s%> for mine own sake and for my servant

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְשַֽׁעְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3470><s%> And Isaiah קְח֖וּ <S%H3947><s%> Take דְּבֶ֣לֶת <S%H1690><s%> a lump תְּאֵנִ֑ים <S%H8384><s%> of figs וַיִּקְח֛וּ <S%H3947><s%> And they took וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> and laid עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַשְּׁחִ֖ין <S%H7822><s%> [it] on the boil וַיֶּֽחִי׃ <S%H2421><s%> and he recovered

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said חִזְקִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H2396><s%> And Hezekiah אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְשַׁעְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3470><s%> unto Isaiah מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> What א֔וֹת <S%H226><s%> What [shall be] the sign כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יִרְפָּ֥א <S%H7495><s%> will heal יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD לִ֑י וְעָלִ֛יתִי <S%H5927><s%> me and that I shall go up בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> age הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֖י <S%H7992><s%> the third בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְשַׁעְיָ֗הוּ <S%H3470><s%> And Isaiah זֶה־ <S%H2088><s%> This לְּךָ֤ הָאוֹת֙ <S%H226><s%> This sign מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> shalt thou have of the LORD כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> will do יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he דִּבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> that he hath spoken הָלַ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go forward הַצֵּל֙ <S%H6738><s%> shall the shadow עֶ֣שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> ten מַֽעֲל֔וֹת <S%H4609><s%> degrees אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or יָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> or go back עֶ֥שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> ten מַעֲלֽוֹת׃ <S%H4609><s%> steps

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> answered יְחִזְקִיָּ֔הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah נָקֵ֣ל <S%H7043><s%> It is a light thing לַצֵּ֔ל <S%H6738><s%> for the shadow לִנְט֖וֹת <S%H5186><s%> to go down עֶ֣שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> ten מַעֲל֑וֹת <S%H4609><s%> degrees לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no כִ֔י <S%H3588><s%> for יָשׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> return הַצֵּ֛ל <S%H6738><s%> nay but let the shadow אֲחֹרַנִּ֖ית <S%H322><s%> backward עֶ֥שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> ten מַעֲלֽוֹת׃ <S%H4609><s%> degrees

וַיִּקְרָ֛א <S%H7121><s%> cried יְשַׁעְיָ֥הוּ <S%H3470><s%> And Isaiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וַיָּ֣שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> and he brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצֵּ֗ל <S%H6738><s%> the shadow בַּֽ֠מַּעֲלוֹת <S%H4600><s%> bruised אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יָרְדָ֜ה <S%H3381><s%> which it had gone down בְּמַעֲל֥וֹת <S%H4609><s%> degrees אָחָ֛ז <S%H271><s%> of Ahaz אֲחֹֽרַנִּ֖ית <S%H322><s%> backward עֶ֥שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> ten מַעֲלֽוֹת׃ <S%H4609><s%> by פ

בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> At that time הַהִ֡יא <S%H1931><s%> he שָׁלַ֡ח <S%H7971><s%> sent בְּרֹאדַ֣ךְ בַּ֠לְאֲדָן <S%H1255><s%> Berodachbaladan בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בַּלְאֲדָ֧ן <S%H1081><s%> of Baladan מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶ֛ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon סְפָרִ֥ים <S%H5612><s%> letters וּמִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> and a present אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חִזְקִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H2396><s%> unto Hezekiah כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁמַ֔ע <S%H8085><s%> for he had heard כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for חָלָ֖ה <S%H2470><s%> had been sick חִזְקִיָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H2396><s%> that Hezekiah

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> hearkened עֲלֵיהֶם֮ <S%H5921><s%> and חִזְקִיָּהוּ֒ <S%H2396><s%> And Hezekiah וַיַּרְאֵ֣ם <S%H7200><s%> unto them and shewed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> them all the house נְכֹתֹ֡ה <S%H5238><s%> of his precious things אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּסֶף֩ <S%H3701><s%> the silver וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַזָּהָ֨ב <S%H2091><s%> and the gold וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּשָׂמִ֜ים <S%H1314><s%> and the spices וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> שֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> ointment הַטּ֗וֹב <S%H2896><s%> and the precious וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> and [all] the house כֵּלָ֔יו <S%H3627><s%> of his armour וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that was נִמְצָ֖א <S%H4672><s%> and all that was found בְּאֽוֹצְרֹתָ֑יו <S%H214><s%> in his treasures לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> there was דָבָ֗ר <S%H1697><s%> there was nothing אֲ֠שֶׁר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor הֶרְאָ֧ם <S%H7200><s%> shewed חִזְקִיָּ֛הוּ <S%H2396><s%> that Hezekiah בְּבֵית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> in his house וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מֶמְשַׁלְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H4474><s%> dominion

וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> Then came יְשַֽׁעְיָ֣הוּ <S%H3470><s%> Isaiah הַנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto king חִזְקִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> to him מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> What אָמְר֣וּ ׀ <S%H559><s%> unto him What said הָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H376><s%> men הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וּמֵאַ֙יִן֙ <S%H370><s%> where יָבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> came אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> about וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said חִזְקִיָּ֔הוּ <S%H2396><s%> they unto thee? And Hezekiah מֵאֶ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country רְחוֹקָ֛ה <S%H7350><s%> from a far בָּ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> They are come מִבָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> [even] from Babylon

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> What רָא֖וּ <S%H7200><s%> What have they seen בְּבֵיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1004><s%> All [the things] that [are] in mine house וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answered חִזְקִיָּ֗הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> is in בְּבֵיתִי֙ <S%H1004><s%> house רָא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> have they seen לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become דָבָ֛ר <S%H1697><s%> there is nothing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not הִרְאִיתִ֖ם <S%H7200><s%> that I have not shewed בְּאֹצְרֹתָֽי׃ <S%H214><s%> among my treasures

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְשַׁעְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3470><s%> And Isaiah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חִזְקִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H2396><s%> unto Hezekiah שְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> Hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD
